title: Master Giovanni N
overview: MasterGiovanniN follows the daily lives of the MasterGiovanniN Club. The club founders Gio, Serena, and Miles goes on adventures in places like school, in there house, and even around town. The Club has to face bullies and enemies like The bully named Bo, and the evil store cashier Dave. Although Gio, Serena, and Miles argue, fight, and mess with each other they still love each other in every way.
